Review: Smooth and simple betting experience. Probably second only to Bet365 for me. Loses a star because I don't like how to find the day's horse racing. It's too convoluted, just give me one click access to all the day's meetings rather than having to go round the houses. But otherwise this is a very usable app and I like the loyalty rewards

The mobile app is very good but I want them to spend more time on it as there is still plenty of room for improvement. I don't like how the website constantly reminds me to use the app. I'd also rather that the mobile website had more features as I feel that trying to align them so closely ends up limiting functionality. My biggest problem is navigation and search - it's not up to scratch.

Recently became quite janky. Seems to lag badly. Several times in past few days, while trying to place bets, there has been a delay when typing stake in. Scrolling through events, screen goes blank, and it takes several seconds to populate the list. Used to be super smooth. Not sure what's gone wrong recently...

For an inexperienced gambler I'm happy with the app. Good sign up bonus. Clear odds. Easy to set limits etc I'm sure it's the same with every other app but since the last time (5 years) I had a gambling app, when you withdraw your winnings it's instantaneous back into your chosen account, not 4 working days. Which is great.

App isn't that great imo. Paddy powers odds feel lower then others. More just be my luck with them. But when I play something it will just be nothing every spin. But other apps I get something come up every now and then. This is after several tries. The wonder wheel is basically pointless. You get the odd scratch card which is just a waste of time. They only have promos on sports and nothing else. Beat the drop is a joke. The questions start off easy but then get stupid half way through.

Great odds, very userfriendly. Quickly becoming my favourite sports betting app. Are there things that could be improved, absolutely. I'd like to follow the stats I'm betting on to see how I'm doing, but it doesn't take away enough to ruin my experience. Very good, very fun.

Great, apart from the search. I like how easy it is to use, and it updates your balance quickly when you've had a win. But the search is rubbish! It didn't used to be this bad. Searching for the trainer's name, when I know that they have several horses running tomorrow, gets zero results.

The cashout function is rarely available despite good internet connection. One game I had the message that something was happening in the game affecting the cashout value. This lasted the entire game. Almost impossible to get any customer service from Paddy. The cynic in me thinks it's by design to reduce cashout opportunity.

Love how the website looks and the colours,the offers are great,but guys the actual movement around the site is so glitchy, and doesn't make any sense.
